metadata.description: Clean bijective mapping of IEL domains to second-order ontological properties for UIP Step 2
metadata.mapping_principle: Closest conceptual and functional relationship between domain focus and ontological property essence
metadata.completeness: Perfect 1:1 bijection ensuring no gaps or overlaps
metadata.refactor_notes: Cleaned version - removed complex values and Mandelbrot constants per IEL_ONTO_KIT refactor

AestheticoPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - aesthetic reasoning directly maps to beauty manifestation
AestheticoPraxis.domain_focus: Aesthetic reasoning, beauty analysis, harmonious perfection

RelatioPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Strong match - relational reasoning fundamentally about love connections
RelatioPraxis.domain_focus: Relational reasoning, connection analysis, relationship verification

PraxeoPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - action reasoning is expression of divine will
PraxeoPraxis.domain_focus: Action reasoning, practical decision-making, behavioral analysis

GlorioPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - glory reasoning about divine majesty manifestation
GlorioPraxis.domain_focus: Glory reasoning, divine honor analysis, transcendent excellence

ZelosPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Strong match - zeal and divine wrath both express passionate intensity
ZelosPraxis.domain_focus: Zeal reasoning, passionate devotion, fervent commitment evaluation
ZelosPraxis.property_essence: Divine judgment against evil and injustice

MakarPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - divine favor reasoning directly about blessedness
MakarPraxis.domain_focus: Blessedness reasoning, divine favor analysis, beatific excellence

GnosiPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - epistemic reasoning is knowledge manifestation
GnosiPraxis.domain_focus: Epistemic reasoning, knowledge verification, truth analysis

AxioPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - axiological reasoning about truth and value foundations
AxioPraxis.domain_focus: Axiological reasoning, value analysis, foundational principles

ThemiPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - normative reasoning about justice and moral order
ThemiPraxis.domain_focus: Normative reasoning, moral analysis, ethical standards

TheoPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - theological reasoning about divine goodness
TheoPraxis.domain_focus: Theological reasoning, divine attribute analysis, sacred truth

ModalPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Strong match - modal reasoning about necessary truths and logical necessity
ModalPraxis.domain_focus: Modal reasoning, necessity analysis, possibility evaluation

DynaPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - dynamic reasoning about power and capability
DynaPraxis.domain_focus: Dynamic reasoning, power analysis, capability assessment

HexiPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Strong match - habitual reasoning patterns reflect accumulated wisdom
HexiPraxis.domain_focus: Habitual reasoning, pattern recognition, expertise development
HexiPraxis.property_essence: Perfect practical knowledge and sound judgment

ChremaPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Strong match - temporal phase reasoning about eternal aspects
ChremaPraxis.domain_focus: Temporal phase reasoning, timing analysis, chronological evaluation

MuPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Strong match - recursive reasoning about self-referential unity
MuPraxis.domain_focus: Recursive reasoning, self-reference analysis, fixed-point evaluation

TychePraxis.conceptual_alignment: Strong match - probabilistic reasoning about divine providence over chance
TychePraxis.domain_focus: Probabilistic reasoning, chance analysis, uncertainty evaluation
TychePraxis.property_essence: Divine governance over seemingly random events

ErgoPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - work reasoning about actual accomplishment
ErgoPraxis.domain_focus: Work reasoning, efficiency analysis, productive capability

AnthropPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Strong match - human-centered reasoning about ultimate perfection
AnthropPraxis.domain_focus: Anthropological reasoning, human nature analysis, personal development

TeloPraxis.conceptual_alignment: Perfect match - teleological reasoning directly about divine purpose
TeloPraxis.domain_focus: Teleological reasoning, purpose analysis, goal-directed evaluation
TeloPraxis.property_essence: Ultimate final cause and supreme end
